content: Using the Rattle-Drum here one final time will cause the spirit of the boy to appear before you, and invite you to hop down the well to meet a “friend”. Unfortunately, if the dull echoing roars coming from somewhere below are any indication, you’re not going to meet a friendly face down there.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mad_Tiger_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Mad Tiger Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Mad Tiger Location'.
The content is as follows:
Using the Rattle-Drum here one final time will cause the spirit of the boy to appear before you, and invite you to hop down the well to meet a “friend”. Unfortunately, if the dull echoing roars coming from somewhere below are any indication, you’re not going to meet a friendly face down there.
